name: Luganodes
description: You want more? We give more! Delegate with us and get a share of any airdrops we receive. Luganodes, is a leading Swiss-operated Institutional-Grade blockchain infrastructure provider, managing over $3 Billion in staked assets across 45+ networks. We run ~7%(second largest) of the Natively Restaked Ethereum on bare metal infrastructure with 99.99% uptime.
